nodes.text: The Kime Enanrum Academy of Arts was an institution on Coruscant where renowned poet, painter, and sculptor Janyor of Bith served as professor emeritus after the Hosnian Cataclysm.
The Kime Enanrum Academy of Arts was mentioned in the 2016 reference book Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy, written by Pablo Hidalgo.
